short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control video/audio in the webpage with keyboard shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that lets you control video/audio in the webpage with keyboard shortcuts. Supported controls are: pause/play, volume up/down, seek backwards/forwards, speed up, slow down, and mute/unmute.
